snippet.title: Shrine's Legacy Demo Release!
snippet.description:
The Shrine's Legacy Demo is finally out! You can get your FREE Steam key for the demo here:
https://www.positiveconceptgames.com/shrineslegacy/getdemo/

About Shrine's Legacy:

In this SNES-like action adventure RPG, you’ll wield elemental magic to explore the nooks and crannies of Ardemia and battle a rising evil. Play single player or with a friend in co-op!

Shrine’s Legacy lets you use elemental Gemstone spells in real-time both to defeat foes and remove obstacles! Meet intriguing characters along the way as the two heroes journey to restore the Sword of Shrine.

-

Our Website: https://positiveconceptgames.com/shrineslegacy
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shrineslegacy
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1435410/Shrines_Legacy/
